sentences.english: God does not want us feeling stuck with a JOB.
sentences.chinese: 神不愿意我们困于交差的光景。

sentences.english: Scenes from our childhood still appear vividly before us.
sentences.chinese: 我们童年时代的光景还历历在目。

sentences.english: Sun Shaoping knew that the family's situation was on the edge of collapse.
sentences.chinese: 少平知道，家里的光景现在已经临近崩溃。

sentences.english: He recalled the honeymoon, and blushed at the recollection of it.
sentences.chinese: 他想起他度蜜月的光景，一回忆往事就涨红了脸。

sentences.english: In just a few years, Yunlin's Kukeng has become synonymous with Taiwan's coffee industry.
sentences.chinese: 才几年光景，云林古坑已经是台湾咖啡的代名词。

sentences.english: In the immediate days following Ray's death, I did not teach.
sentences.chinese: 雷去世后的一段光景，我没去上课。

sentences.english: I still remember very clearly the scene of our first meeting.
sentences.chinese: 咱俩初次见面的光景我还记得很清楚。

sentences.english: About a hundred and twenty fathoms , or six hundred feet.
sentences.chinese: 大约有一百二十寻，也就是二百米的光景。

sentences.english: In less than a year, Cao Shufa would earn the excavators.
sentences.chinese: 不到一年的光景，曹淑发便挣回了这台挖机。

sentences.english: Six Shis thousand this place atmospheres are harmonious, the curious cat was another scene.
sentences.chinese: 陆莳千这边气氛和谐，怪猫那边就是另一幅光景了。

sentences.english: Yes ah, the tree counting from the seedlings have to be exciting for several decades to become useful bar.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，树从幼苗算起也得几十年的光景才能成材吧。

sentences.english: I was transfixed at its sight.
sentences.chinese: 看到这个光景我吓呆了。

sentences.english: Secondary inference, —that he had occasional bursts of prosperity, or he could not have redeemed the pledge.
sentences.chinese: 他偶尔会遇上好光景，否则他不会有钱去赎当的。

definition: in a flash/in the blink of an eye/to glance
to pass in an instant/over in the twinkling of an eye
to turn around/to look back/to recollect
(literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
time flies like an arrow (idiom); How time flies!
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
